summary: Provides utilities to initialize and manage OpenTelemetry tracing within Metaflow, including context extraction/injection, trace ID retrieval, and decorators that wrap workflow steps for automatic span creation. Handles special cases such as post-fork reinitialization and command‑line entrypoint integration.
business_intent: Enable end‑to‑end observability of Metaflow pipelines by automatically generating and exporting tracing data to configured backends, facilitating performance monitoring and debugging across distributed execution environments.
